answers.answer: Maybe I'm lucky. I haven't had mood swings, cravings or the urge to nest (seriously who wants to clean BY CHOICE??? lol) I'm 38 weeks tomorrow and would rather just sleep all the time. But if you feel a mood coming on maybe just say to to him I'm not in the best mood babe I'm just going to lay down for a bit. Or ignore he says something you don't like hold your tongue and walk away. Take a hot governor bath to relax yourself a bit.

i do spend about 2 hours a night in the bath these days lol , i find it relaxing , he is good as gold fair play to him , i think he had nesting more than me i do get the odd urge to clean cupboards out at 1 in the morning ..but its not often. luckyenough no cravings either :) which is good as i have gestational diabetes
I luckily havent had any mood swings either an im 33w lol hopefully i dont get em

question: so ladies how have u been coping with mood swings? im 34 n 2 weeks, havent had them too bad but i do every now and again get a bad hour or so ..my poor hubby always gets the other end of it.. lucky enough he understands n just gets on with it.
title: mood swings
